title: Groom, wearing moustache, dark bow tie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, holding knife with smiling bride wearing headpiece with veil, two strand necklace, and light colored long sleeved wedding dress with flame patterned applique on yoke and skirt, standing behind table with light colored tablecloth and three tiered wedding cake in interior with striped floral wallpaper and window with floral lace curtains, possibly in Washington, Pennsylvania
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
